title: Irina Shayk cuts a casual figure in brown turtleneck and medium-wash jeans
text:
She's a busy model and actress.

But Irina Shayk's focus was all about being a mom on Friday, with the Russian beauty seen pushing her daughter Lea's stroller on the streets of NYC.

The 33-year-old supermodel was dressed perfectly for the changing winds of fall, donning a brown turtleneck sweater and a pair of medium-wash jeans.

Chic: Irina Shayk kept up her duties on Friday as she was seen pushing her daughter Lea's stroller on the streets of NYC

She also wore a set of calf-length brown leather boots that complemented her sweater.

Irina shaded her vision with a pair of black rectangular sunglasses.

The 5ft 10in beauty is currently believed to be single after she parted ways with screen star Bradley Cooper in June.

Posh: The 33-year-old Russian supermodel was dressed perfectly for the changing winds of fall, donning a brown turtleneck sweater and a pair of medium-wash jeans

Irina was first linked to Bradley in 2015 after splitting with heartthrob footballer Cristiano Ronaldo.

She and Bradley welcomed their two-year-old daughter Lea De Seine in 2017.

Their breakup went public in early June of this year.

Irina has shown her impatience with expectations that she should make her sense of personal style more modest now that she's a mom.

There's mommy! She also wore a set of calf-length brown leather boots that complemented her sweater

'Tell me one reason why, just because you're a mother, you need to wear a longer skirt. No! I don't believe in that. I really don't,' she told Harper's Bazaar.

'How is it that people think of this idea? Why should you have to change who you are and how you feel just because you become a mother?'

'I'm like, tell me why. Tell me one reason! I don't believe in that. I don't understand why.'

Happier times: The 5ft 10in beauty is currently believed to be single after she parted ways with screen star Bradley Cooper in June. Here they are in January at the Golden Globe Awards

She also got real about her views on marriage, despite the fact that she and Cooper never ended up tying the knot amid engagement rumors.

'Everyone looks at it differently,' she explained.

'Do I believe in marriage? Yes, of course. I’m not the kind of person who is against it.'

Prior to Cooper, Shayk dated footballer Cristiano Ronaldo and Linkin Park drummer Rob Bourdon.
description: Irina Shayk's focus was all about being a mom on Friday, with the Russian beauty seen pushing her daughter Lea's stroller on the streets of NYC.
